About

Hello! I am Rohit Gupta. I completed my undergraduate degree in Electrical Engineering from Delhi Technological University, New Delhi, India. I am Avid Maker and Do It Yourself (DIY) enthusiast.I am always fiddling with ”things” to bring sense to this entropic world. Back in college days i have even built and raced solar cars. I love to blog about Technology, DIY,Travel and almost everything i feel.I am great fan of Iron Man. Check out my arc reactor !

My interests include:

  • Electronics
  • Internet of Things
  • Linux
  • Audio/Acoustics
  • Rapid Prototyping
  • Economics
  • Wearables
  • Wireless Sensor Networks (WSN)
  • Electric Vehicles
  • Social Psychology
  • Design Usability
  • HCD/E

and..

  • Travel
  • Food

umm...

Have questions or suggestions? Feel free to ask me on Twitter.

Thanks for reading!
